data.name: ChangeCoverLinkAlt
data.value: Link to go back to comparison page and change your selection

data.name: CheckboxLegend
data.value: Do you agree to these terms and conditions and other important information above?

data.name: CreditCheckLinkSuffix
data.value: There may also be a requirement to take a security deposit.

data.name: CreditCheckParagraph
data.value: In order to process your application, we may supply your personal information to credit reference agencies (CRAs) and they will give us information about you – such as your financial history. We do this to assess creditworthiness and product suitability, check your identity, manage your account, trace and recover debts and prevent criminal activity. We will also continue to exchange information about you with CRAs on an ongoing basis, including about your settled accounts and any debts not fully repaid on time. CRAs will share your information with other organisations. The identities of the CRAs and the way in which they use and share personal information, are

data.name: DDEditLinkAlt
data.value: Link to change your bank details

data.name: DDMandateLink
data.value: View Direct Debit form for your cover

data.name: DDMandateLinkAlt
data.value: Link to download printable Direct Debit instruction

data.name: EligibilityParagraph1
data.value: This policy is for owners of domestic properties only. Retail, commercial and other premises used for business are not eligible.

data.name: ImportantInfoParagraph
data.value: All the prices we display include any applicable taxes and fees. 12 month contract applies. Your cover will start on the next working day.

data.name: OfferParagraph
data.value: If this applies to you, your gas account will be credited in the next 46 calendar days of the cancellation period being completed.

data.name: OfferPrefix
data.value: With £0 excess SSE gas customers get

data.name: PaymentEditLinkAlt
data.value: Link to change the date of your payment

data.name: PersonalEditLinkAlt
data.value: Link to change your personal details

data.name: PrintLinkAlt
data.value: Link to print your order summary

data.name: PrivacyLinkAlt
data.value: Link to view our privacy notice

data.name: PrivacyLinkSuffix
data.value: for details about how we use your information.

data.name: RightToChangeHeader
data.value: Your right to change your mind

data.name: RightToChangeParagraph1
data.value: You have an 18-calendar day period in which to cancel your product, with no penalty, from your product start date. This is known as your cancellation period.

data.name: RightToChangeParagraph2
data.value: You may also cancel this cover at any time after the cancellation period. Your cover will end immediately upon receipt of your instruction. However, you will be responsible to pay us for any cover provided and any fees incurred. To cancel, simply write to us at OVO (S) Home Services Limited, Grampian House, 200 Dunkeld Road, Perth, PH1 3AQ telling us you want to cancel. If it’s easier, you can phone us on 033 3006 9806, use the Cancellation Form or email us at home.services@sse.com

data.name: RightToChangeParagraph3
data.value: Cancelling your Direct Debit without contacting us will not mean you have cancelled your cover with us.

data.name: SummaryIntro
data.value: Please check the details and confirm you’ve read the terms and conditions to complete your cover selection.

data.name: TaxDisclaimerLabel
data.value: Price inclusive of VAT and Insurance Premium Tax

data.name: TermsAndConditionsAriaDescription
data.value: Tick this box to confirm the communication terms and conditions

data.name: TermsAndConditionsHeader
data.value: Before you confirm your order, please read our terms and conditions:

data.name: BankDetailsModalButtonAlt
data.value: Link to continue and change your bank details

data.name: BankDetailsModalMessage
data.value: Going back to change your bank or payment details will clear all your Direct Debit information so you’ll need to enter it again.

data.name: CoverDetailsModalMessage
data.value: By changing your cover choice, you’ll be taken back to select a new cover option and will need to tell us your Direct Debit information again.

data.name: ModalCancelButtonAlt
data.value: Link to close and return to order summary page

data.name: PersonalDetailsModalButtonAlt
data.value: Link to continue and change your personal details

data.name: PersonalDetailsModalMessage
data.value: By changing your personal details, you’ll be taken back through previous steps and will need to tell us your Direct Debit information again.

data.name: EligibilityParagraph2
data.value: If you are protecting the boiler at your property it must have a power output of less than 70kW and be powered by natural gas. Boilers powered by liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), oil, renewable heat sources and electric are not covered.

data.name: OurBrandHeader
data.value: You’ll join one of our brands

data.name: OurBrandHeaderParagraph1
data.value: Your brand depends on where you live, but they’re all part of the SSE family. For Scotland it’s SSE Scottish Hydro, for Northern England it’s SSE, for Southern England it’s SSE Southern Electric and for Wales it’s SSE SWALEC. Your brand will be shown on the paperwork we send you and on your bank statement when you make payments to us.

data.name: OurBrandHeaderParagraph2
data.value: OVO (S) Home Services Limited is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA), reference number 695476. Registered in Scotland No. SC292102 at Grampian House, 200 Dunkeld Road, Perth, PH1 3AQ. Our insurance policies are sold and administer by us and underwritten by AmTrust Europe Limited.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsCheckboxHomeSerevicesLabelText
data.value:
By ticking the box you confirm that:
  1. You have read and understood the policy booklet and Insurance product information document and are eligible for cover;
  2. You have provided accurate information (not doing so could invalidate your insurance);
  3. You are consenting to enter into a binding Service Contract with OVO (S) Home Services Limited for your initial inspection and annual service and a binding Breakdown Contract with AmTrust Europe Limited for repairs to your system; and
  4. You provide your express consent for your cover to commence on the next business day (during your cancellation period).

data.name: SupplyAddressDetailsModalMessage
data.value: By changing your cover address, you’ll be taken back through previous steps and will need to tell us your Direct Debit information again.

data.name: SupplyAddressEditLinkAlt
data.value: Link to change your supply address

data.name: SupplyAddressModalButtonAlt
data.value: Link to continue and change cover address

data.name: EligibilityParagraph3
data.value: We do not cover any models for the following brands of boiler: Servowarm, Chaffoteaux or Ferroli. Additionally, we do not cover the Ideal Istor boiler or any thermal store products made by Gledhill.

data.name: EligibilityParagraph4
data.value: Boilers with long-term and obvious pre-existing faults or system deficiencies, as determined by our engineer acting reasonably, are not covered.
